annonstext:
About us

At Budbee we are developing the next generation last mile logistics solutions for the e-commerce industry and even though it's pretty advanced stuff, it is all about having the right people on board!

Since we are growing incredibly fast with new markets or products being added pretty much every month we are not looking for the average Joe. The right people for us are people who love change and challenges and at the same time have an inner drive to get things done. By joining us in this journey you are also becoming a part of the Budbee family.

Since April 2018 Budbee is backed by the prestigious investor Kinnevik. Today we are already doing millions of home deliveries per year, operating in Sweden, Netherlands, Finland and Denmark.

Everyone has heard about tech or even fintech or medtech... join us and be a part of the latest and greatest, Logtech!

About the role

We’re looking for a mobile app developer to join our tech team in Stockholm. You will be a part of the mobile team and your main focus will be developing Budbee's mobile applications with React Native, which are both consumer facing as well as multiple internal tools. You will work closely with a team of talented designers, engineers and product managers while engaging internal stakeholders and customers to define a long-term strategy. The ideal candidate for this role will be able to translate high-level strategy into great designs. By joining Budbee you'll receive a friendly, informal environment that supports your individual growth and, of course, have a lot of fun together. 

What you'll need

Experience in React Native (4+ years)

Experience in Swift or Java/Kotlin is a plus

Fluent in English, both verbal and writing

Does this sound like you? Apply today! Interviews will happen continuously.

utbildningsniva.namn: Eftergymnasial utbildning två år eller längre
